sentences.sContent: companies that are polluting and destroying the environment
sentences.sCn: 污染和破坏环境的公司

sentences.sContent: ...existing rental businesses will try to destroy competition...

words.tran: 驱逐舰；破坏者；起破坏作用的事物

trans.tranOther: to damage something so badly that it no longer exists or cannot be used or repaired
